reviews.text: Note: the check in desk is at the bar.
reviews.title: Small, but Satisfactory

reviews.text: Rooms are small and the bathroom is even smaller. But right in the city center and clean. Nice garden for eating and drinking. Also, thin walls. People are friendly.
reviews.title: Clean room, perfect breakfast

reviews.text: I stayed just one night for a business trip in this small and cute hotel. Small rooms, and just the necessary equipment, room little damp. Boxspring bed that provided good night of sleep.
reviews.title: Cute overnight stop

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was perfect, with fresh baked farmbread, croissants an d fresh juice. People helpfull and nice.
reviews.title: friendly hotel with excellent food

reviews.text: In short, nice hotel in cute little town on the board of the Merwede river, with somewhat standard clean rooms with good breakfast. Price-quality equation very good.
reviews.title: Good food in a pleasant atmosphere
